title: Metallic Gold Silver Foil Fringe Curtain Shiny Tinsel For Party, Birthday, Prom, Photo Booth, Special Event (3' x 8' ft) Curtains (2-Pack Gold)
features: ALL PURPOSE - These shiny curtains are great for all events, crafts and anything in between! At 3' (feet) x 8' (feet) Drop, you can use them for almost anything your creative mind allows!

SHINY & DECORATIVE - Shiny, decorative, and simply great. It doesn't matter where you place it, it'll just look awesome. That's because the gold foil reflects and evenly scatters the light that hits it. It looks pretty awesome.
STRONG & STURDY - Forget about those cheap plastic curtains that fall apart as soon as you put them up. With these, you'll have them lasting you for ages to come and the life of your party.

PREMIUM MATERIALS - We use only the finest materials when making these curtains. You know what means? Your guests will be able to walk through them and not fall apart. Their reflective nature will make your party stand out from the rest!
GREAT FOR PARTIES & EVENTS - Photo Booth Parties, Halloween, New Years and any other holiday you can think of!
